item.title: RPN calculator
item.description: 14:51 Thursday 16 June 2016 JST For FreeCodeCamp, I just made a crappy calculator in Javascript. They wanted when where I could type “5 * 6 / 3” into a field and evaluate it, but I chose to go RPN on them. See the Pen bedvBW by Rob Nugen (@thunderrabit) on CodePen.
